thread.title: Qomfortable night, good location
thread.title_full: Qomfortable night, good location - Review of Premier Inn London Angel Islington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Flynn59
title: Qomfortable night, good location
text:
Perfect location less then five minutes walk from the tube and set one block back from Upper Street making it quiet fir a city hotel. The usual comfortable Premier Inn bed and decent sized room.
O2 Academy, Almeida Theatre and other Islington attractions all within easy walking distance - and even closer to to a host of coffee shops, bars and restaurants
